main event: An unidentified object was observed hovering for about one minute.
interesting points: The object was about the size of a soft-ball at arm's length.,The sighting occurred in Canton, Ohio at 2200 hours.,The observation type was classified as ground-radar.,The sighting lasted for 60 seconds.,Comments suggest that the sighting may have been caused by an air-intership radar.
witness description: No witnesses reported in the file.
